attributes.action: revert the British coinage from the new designs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The general idea could be seen to be to make the pound so undesirable that the public will be swayed to vote for the Euro to replace it. A basic psychological tactic.

The new designs for the British coins are no more than someone dropping the shapes onto the coat of arms and cutting them out.
